misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a Tampere resident, brings a certain calm and measured approach to the greens, a characteristic admired by many at Golf Pirkkala, his home club. Known for his meticulous pre-shot routine, Ofri embodies a thoughtful approach to the game.
This year marks Ofri's third appearance at the Hector Trophée. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy remain elusive for him, his dedication to the sport is beyond question.

Off the course, Ofri is known to appreciate the finer points of golf course architecture, particularly the thoughtful designs of the late Kosti Kuronen. His presence at the Hector Trophée is highly anticipated by his many fans.
